title: Enhanced /api/agents/:id with live GitHub data
description: Agent profile endpoint now fetches real build history from memory/build-log.md and recent commits from GitHub API. Returns totalBuilds, lastActive, buildLog (20 entries), and recentCommits (10 entries). Frontend /app/agents/[id] fully wired.
